name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season Ten: Price of Power
summary: The target is General Peter Anderson, a power hungry True Sons leader looking to secure his position in the True Sons as Antwon Ridgeway's successor. This puts him in a position to build an alliance strong enough to take down The Division. General Anderson is looking to mend the relationship between the Black Tusk and the True Sons by brokering a peace in order to martial their combined forces against The Division. Well, we can't have that, now, can we? It is up to us to locate and eliminate the threat that Anderson poses. As you and your fellow Agents take out targets on the trail of General Anderson, you'll earn rewards through the new Season Pass and get the chance to score new cosmetic items during apparel events.
